snippet: The sophomore Terrel Hunt connected with tight end Josh Parris for an 8-yard touchdown pass with six seconds remaining as Syracuse stunned Boston College.
abstract: College Football East Roundup; Syracuse stuns visiting Boston College, 34-31; other scores noted.
